::KitKat::

She looked at him and wept.  "I..I can't take the pain of it any 
more.  All I think about is her.  I close my eyes and see her getting 
shot again and again.  I...I." She covered her face iwth her hands 
and cried.  "I can't lead if I stay like this.  Look at me, I'm a 
Pred leader and I'm crying on the floor.  Please, please erase these 
memories. Please." She was begging him.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He knelt down, and just held her.
> "what exactly will that do? To your memory? To us?" He thought he 
knew.
> If he was right, he didn't know if he could bring himself to do it. 
She
> was his reason for liveing. Whithout her, he might as well blow his 
head
> off.
